Every room filled with light, the home's impeccable interior comprises three bedrooms (large master) all with built-in robes, spotless central bathroom, separate WC and separate shower room. Outside, discover a sizeable backyard complete with large studio/home office, handy storage sheds and secure double carport (accessed via Chingford Street). Positioned for convenience, walking distance to a choice of bus routes, it's also close to Station Street cafes and shops, Fairfield Station and Fairfield Primary School, as well as easy access to local parks, Darebin Creek trails and Northcote Aquatic Centre.

A four-tower complex built behind the famed Terminus Hotel and moments from the Yarra River, bike trails and golf course, with Victoria Gardens Shopping Centre, IKEA and readily accessible public transport close by, Green Square has something for everyone.
This seventh level, top floor apartment impresses with full-height, light maximising glazing, considered open-plan design and luxury fixtures and fittings. Featuring a polished, fully tiled bathroom accessing good-sized euro laundry, super stylish stone-topped open plan kitchen with mirrored splash-backs, stainless steel appliances, integrated dishwasher and generous dark-toned cabinetry. The generous dining/living zone extends out to a private covered terrace and a spacious bedroom contains built-in mirrored robes. Fully carpeted throughout, with split system air-conditioning. Exclusive resident amenities include a library, indoor/outdoor swimming pool, gym and rooftop barbecue with sky garden. Green Square has become a popular choice for both the astute investor and owner-occupiers alike.

Let the Sun Shine In!

https://auctionnow.com.au/properties/61611#/
In the very heart of Fitzroy, moments from the cosmopolitan delights of Brunswick Street, this very unique apartment is rare in the true sense of the word. Located in the boutique NOJO building, it is one of only 23 and enjoys a commanding 3rd floor position where it can never be built out.
Enjoying a brilliant northern aspect where every room enjoys the sun and direct access to one of Fitzroy's most generous outdoor terraces. The terrace will be the ideal place to enjoy the very best of alfresco living.
Be a master chef in your own entertainer's kitchen with stone bench tops, ergonomic drawers, integrated fridge and high-quality European appliances. The kitchen enjoys a great aspect to a spacious open plan living room with built in joinery and a hideaway office. Sit back and bathe in the northerly sun beaming through the floor to ceiling sliding doors.
Accommodation is via 2 generous double bedrooms, main with ensuite, 2nd bathroom and both bedrooms feature an abundance of natural light and easy access to the terrace.
The apartment is quality from top to bottom with double glazed windows, integrated air-conditioning, recessed pelmets, sheer curtains and ample storage. At 90sqm internally and a 40sqm plus terrace, it is a terrific opportunity for the astute buyer seeking a perfect lock and leave lifestyle opportunity.
The apartment is also advantaged by full video intercom access, 1 secure, easy to access, car space and fully enclosed storage room.
With Brunswick Street and Johnston streets on your doorstep, stay local for some boutique shopping, pick up a croissant at Lune, or eat and drink in one of the many cafes and bars on offer. Alternatively jump on the no.96 tram and be in the heart of the city in 5-10 mins.
